style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;">Board</p><hr size="1">&nbsp;- tag: String<br><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- turn: Colour</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- gameOver: boolean</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- winner: String</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;"># boardMap: Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"># wallPieceMapping: Map&lt;BasePiece, Position&gt;&nbsp;</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ Board()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ placeChessPieces(Colour): void</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ isGameOver(): boolean</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getWinner(): String</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ move(Position, Position): void</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ isLegalMove(Position, Position): boolean</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getTurn(): Colour</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getPiece(Position): BasePiece</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getWebViewBoard(): Map&lt;String, String&gt;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getPossibleMoves(Position): List&lt;Position&gt;<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+&nbsp;isCurrentPlayersPiece(Position): boolean</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- isCheck(Colour, Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt;): boolean<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- isCheckMate(Colour, Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt;): boolean<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- isCheckAfterLegalMove(Colour, Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt;, Position, Position): boolean<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- getKingPosition(Colour, Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt;): Position<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>BasePiece</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- tag: String</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"># colour: Colour</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"># directions: Direction[][]</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ BasePiece(Colour)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"># setupDirections(): void</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ isLegalMove(Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt;, Position, Position): boolean<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"># boolean</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getHighlightPolygons(Map&lt;Position, BasePiece&gt; boardMap, Position start): List&lt;Position&gt;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">BA1..BH4</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">GA1..GH4</span></p><p Position&nbsp;{exceptions=InvalidPositionException}</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ neighbour(Direction): Position</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- getColumnChar(int): char</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getRow(): int</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getColumn(): int</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ getColour(): Colour</p><p div.div:
Board - tag: String
- turn: Colour
- gameOver: boolean
- winner: String
# boardMap: Map<Position, BasePiece>
# wallPieceMapping: Map<BasePiece, Position>
+ Board()
+ placeChessPieces(Colour): void
+ isGameOver(): boolean
+ getWinner(): String
+ move(Position, Position): void
+ isLegalMove(Position, Position): boolean
+ getTurn(): Colour
+ getPiece(Position): BasePiece
+ getWebViewBoard(): Map<String, String>
+ getPossibleMoves(Position): List<Position>
+ isCurrentPlayersPiece(Position): boolean
- isCheck(Colour, Map<Position, BasePiece>): boolean
- isCheckMate(Colour, Map<Position, BasePiece>): boolean
- isCheckAfterLegalMove(Colour, Map<Position, BasePiece>, Position, Position): boolean
- getKingPosition(Colour, Map<Position, BasePiece>): Position

div.div:
<<enumeration>>
Position
BA1..BH4
GA1..GH4
RA1..RH4
- colour: Colour
- row: int
- column: int
+ Position(Colour, int, int)
+ get(int): Position {exceptions=InvalidPositionException}
+ neighbour(Direction): Position
- getColumnChar(int): char
+ getRow(): int
+ getColumn(): int
+ getColour(): Colour
+ toString(): String
